targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    wind_speed
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    main_temp
FROM weather_data 
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    main_humidity
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    main_pressure
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    visibility
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    clouds_all
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
    time_bucket('1 minute', recorded_at) AS time,
    governorate,
    AVG(main_temp) AS temperature
FROM weather_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
  AND governorate IN ($governorate)
GROUP BY time, governorate
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
    recorded_at AS "time",
    wind_speed,
    governorate
FROM weather_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
  AND governorate IN ($governorate)
ORDER BY recorded_at;

WITH latest AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (governorate)
        governorate,
        coord_lat AS latitude,
        coord_lon AS longitude,
        main_temp  AS temperature,
        weather_main,
        recorded_at
    FROM weather_data
    WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
      AND governorate IN ($governorate)
    ORDER BY governorate, recorded_at DESC
)
SELECT *
FROM latest;

SELECT
    governorate,
    AVG(main_temp) AS avg_temperature
FROM weather_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
   AND governorate IN ($governorate)
GROUP BY governorate
ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC;

SELECT
    recorded_at AS "time",
    main_humidity AS "Humidity (%)",
    governorate
FROM weather_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
  and governorate IN ($governorate)
ORDER BY recorded_at;

SELECT 
    weather_main,
    COUNT(*) AS count
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
GROUP BY weather_main
ORDER BY count DESC;

SELECT 
    timestamp AS time,
    'Temperature' AS metric,
    main_temp AS value
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    timestamp AS time,
    'Humidity' AS metric,
    main_humidity AS value
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])

ORDER BY time;

SELECT 
    timestamp AS time,
    governorate,
    main_temp AS value
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
ORDER BY time;

SELECT 
    wind_deg
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

WITH latest AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (governorate)
        governorate,
        main_temp,
        main_humidity,
        wind_speed,
        main_pressure,
        weather_main,
        timestamp AS last_update
    FROM weather_data
    WHERE 
        $__timeFilter(timestamp)
        AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
    ORDER BY governorate, timestamp DESC
)
SELECT
    governorate AS "Governorate",
    ROUND(main_temp::numeric, 1) AS "Temperature (°C)",
    main_humidity AS "Humidity (%)",
    ROUND(wind_speed::numeric, 2) AS "Wind Speed (m/s)",
    main_pressure AS "Pressure (hPa)",
    weather_main AS "Condition",
    last_update AS "Last Update"
FROM latest
ORDER BY governorate;

WITH latest AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (governorate)
        governorate,
        weather_main,
        weather_description,
        weather_icon,
        recorded_at
    FROM weather_data
    WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
      AND governorate IN ($governorate)
    ORDER BY governorate, recorded_at DESC
)
SELECT *
FROM latest;

SELECT 
    governorate,
    main_temp AS temperature,
    wind_speed,
    weather_main,
    timestamp
FROM weather_data
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND governorate = ANY(ARRAY[$governorate])
    AND (
        main_temp > 40 
        OR main_temp < 5 
        OR wind_speed > 15 
        OR weather_main IN ('Rain', 'Thunderstorm', 'Snow')
    )
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 50;

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT governorate FROM weather_data ORDER BY governorate;
list.label: Governorate
list.name: governorate
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT governorate FROM weather_data ORDER BY governorate;
